description.en: This course will focus on the importance of well-being for a country's population, including health, happiness, quality of life and life satisfaction. The main factors will be identified that are used to measure well-being (e.g. economic, social, environmental, political). The lifestyle habits of populations will be analysed, including leisure and tourism trends that contribute to well-being. The role of governments will also be considered and the extent to which well-being features in their policies.
description.et: Kursus keskendub riigi elanike heaolu olulisusele, sh tervis, õnn, elukvaliteet ning rahulolu. Kursusel selgitatakse peamisi faktoreid, millega mõõdetakse heaolu (nt majanduslik, sotsiaalne, keskkondlik ning poliitiline). Analüüsitakse elanike elustiili harjumusi, sh vaba aja ja turismi trende, mis mõjutavad heaolu. Samuti käsitletakse valitsuse ja poliitika rolli heaolu arendamisel.

objectives.en: 1. To understand which factors are important for well-being.
objectives.et: 1. Mõista, millised faktorid on olulised heaolus.

objectives.en: 2. To analyse how lifestyle habits and activities contribute to well-being.
objectives.et: 2. Analüüsida, kuid elustiili harjumused ja tegevused mõjutavad heaol.u

objectives.en: 3. To learn how to measure well-being through different research tools and indicators.
objectives.et: 3. Õppida mõõtma heaolu kasutades erinevaid uuringu vahendeid ja näitajaid.

objectives.en: 4. To assess the contribution of leisure and tourism to well-being for both tourists and residents.
objectives.et: 4. Hinnata vaba aja ja turismi rolli turistide ja kohalike elanike heaolu loomisel.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) understands the main factors that constitute well-being;
2) knows the research tools and indicators that are used to measure well-being;
3) knows the ways in which different lifestyle habits contribute to well-being;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) teab, kuidas erinevad elustiili harjumused mõjutavad heaolu;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) knows the role of leisure and tourism in the creation of well-being (including health and happiness).
learning_outcomes.et: 4) teab vaba aja ja turismi rolli heaolu loomisel.

description.en:
Coursework (100%)

A critical analysis of health, wellbeing, happiness and quality of life in Estonia or another country of your choice.

1. Health data and statistics for that country.
2. Happiness studies and research in that country.
3. Discussion of that country's wellbeing status compared to the rest of the EU/OECD/the world.
4. The role of leisure activities and tourism in that country.
5. Recommendations for improving the wellbeing/health/happiness status of the population (including lifestyle).

Students can be granted a one week extension if they can provide a doctor's note or similar (e.g. employer's letter) to demonstrate why they were unable to submit the coursework.
